description:
The first original Gunpla made by Kousaka China. Based on the Beargguy from GUNPLA BUILDERS BEGINNING G, it was completed with her own original concept of a cute stuffed animal turned into a robot. Although this is China`s first attempt at model-building, because she is also a member of the art club, the painting is extremely well done.
Source: Official Website
name: KUMA-03 Beargguy III
